title: Scrapbook, 1949–52
medium:
Medium: paper, cloth
Technique: various weave techniques
inscribed: On front cover, "Schumacher Fabrics Carpets Wallpaper 'At Work'.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Scrapbook containing newspaper clippings, photos, postcards, press releases and actual fabric documenting White house and Capitol renovations. Note 1902 records on last page.
